description:
Here at the Johnston Law Firm, P.C., in Portland, Oregon, we are ready to fight hard on your behalf to help increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you deserve following a preventable accident or mishap caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Nationally ranked as among the top trial lawyers in the country, attorney Marc A. Johnston established our law firm with a mission to deliver the highest level of advocacy and support possible to individuals and families in need. To date, he has secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, earning him membership in the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

In addition, Mr. Johnston has received consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America as well as inclusion in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100 Trial Lawyer list and has received many other accolades and endorsements from his peers. He has also holds a "Superb" client rating on Avvo along with the site's Clients' Choice Award, and our law firm has received countless testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

To begin the process of obtaining the justice you deserve for the suffering you have experienced, you can contact Johnston Law Firm, P.C., to schedule a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times, and you can count on us to go above and beyond what is expected to help you through this difficult time in your life.
